name: Sunscreen
description: Protect your skin from harmful UV rays with our SPF 50 sunscreen. Lightweight and non-greasy formula.

name: Moisturizer
description: Hydrate and nourish your skin with our rich moisturizer. Suitable for all skin types.

name: Lip Balm
description: Keep your lips soft and hydrated with our natural lip balm. Contains beeswax and essential oils.

name: Face Mask
description: Revitalize your skin with our clay face mask. Helps to remove impurities and excess oil.

name: Serum
description: Boost your skincare routine with our vitamin C serum. Brightens and evens skin tone.

name: Exfoliating Scrub
description: Gently exfoliate your skin with our natural scrub. Removes dead skin cells and reveals a fresh glow.

name: Body Lotion
description: Moisturize and soften your skin with our nourishing body lotion. Infused with shea butter and aloe vera.

name: Shampoo
description: Cleanse and strengthen your hair with our sulfate-free shampoo. Suitable for all hair types.

name: Conditioner
description: Hydrate and detangle your hair with our nourishing conditioner. Leaves hair soft and manageable.

name: Hair Mask
description: Deep condition your hair with our repairing hair mask. Restores moisture and shine to dry, damaged hair.

name: Shower Gel
description: Refresh and cleanse your skin with our invigorating body wash. Infused with essential oils for a spa-like experience.

name: Hand Cream
description: Keep your hands soft and hydrated with our fast-absorbing hand cream. Enriched with vitamin E and shea butter.

name: Sunscreen Spray
description: Easy-to-apply sunscreen spray with SPF 30. Provides broad-spectrum protection and a non-greasy finish.

name: Anti-Aging Cream
description: Reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles with our anti-aging cream. Formulated with retinol and hyaluronic acid.

name: Volumizing Mousse
description: Add volume and body to your hair with our lightweight volumizing mousse. Provides long-lasting hold without stiffness.

name: Detangling Spray
description: Easily detangle and smooth your hair with our leave-in detangling spray. Infused with argan oil for added shine.

name: Foot Cream
description: Soothe and soften dry, cracked feet with our intensive foot cream. Contains urea and peppermint oil for a refreshing feel.

name: Cleansing Oil
description: Effectively remove makeup and impurities with our gentle cleansing oil. Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.

name: Makeup Remover Wipes
description: Convenient and effective makeup remover wipes. Infused with aloe vera to soothe and hydrate skin.

name: Facial Toner
description: Refresh and balance your skin with our alcohol-free facial toner. Helps to minimize pores and improve skin texture.

name: Body Scrub
description: Exfoliate and smooth your skin with our invigorating body scrub. Contains natural exfoliants and moisturizing oils.

name: Shaving Cream
description: Get a close, comfortable shave with our rich shaving cream. Formulated with aloe vera and vitamin E to soothe skin.

name: Hair Serum
description: Tame frizz and add shine to your hair with our lightweight hair serum. Infused with argan oil and vitamin E.

name: Heat Protectant Spray
description: Protect your hair from heat damage with our heat protectant spray. Suitable for use before styling with hot tools.

name: Makeup Setting Spray
description: Keep your makeup in place all day with our long-lasting makeup setting spray. Lightweight and refreshing formula.

name: Foundation
description: Achieve a flawless complexion with our buildable foundation. Available in a range of shades to suit all skin tones.

name: Mascara
description: Enhance your lashes with our volumizing mascara. Provides length, volume, and definition without clumping.

name: Eyeshadow Palette
description: Create endless eye looks with our versatile eyeshadow palette. Includes a mix of matte and shimmer shades.

name: Blush
description: Add a natural flush of color to your cheeks with our silky blush. Available in multiple shades to complement any skin tone.

name: Lipstick
description: Make a statement with our long-lasting lipstick. Available in a variety of bold and neutral shades.
